name: Alejandro Aravena
title: Title
description: Alejandro Aravena is an artist who does such and such...
article:
For endaepub itametur, con cus, ni.

Upon entering the castle, visitors were confronted by an accident. Cinderella's carriage had crashed; she and her horses were dead. In a scene that evoked the death of a real-life princess -- Diana -- paparazzi wildly documented the carnage.

This grim, life-size sculpture was created by Banksy at Dismaland, a 'family theme park unsuitable for small children' that the famous street artist opened in England for just over a month this summer. The sardonic take on Disney's amusement empire, which included works by dozens of contributing artists, was Banksy's biggest project to date -- and among the artist's most timely and political. In one instalation, small, remote-controlled boats carried figurine migrants on a faux waterway. And when Dismaland closed, many of its materials were shipped to France to help build shelters for refugees near Calais.

For Banksy, whose identity remains unknown, the cookie-cutter family vacation proved yet another canvas for critiquing the modern condition.
